Content: 9*p48355a0924*turn over     do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area (b) the coleoptiles with ȗ radiation and without ȗ radiation both increased in height but those with ȗ radiation were shorter.  using the results of this investigation, explain the effect of ȗ radiation on the height of the coleoptiles.(2)  *(c) examination of the coleoptiles with ȗ radiation showed that there were fewer cells in mitosis than there are in the coleoptiles without ȗ radiation.   giving practical details, explain how you would compare the number of cells undergoing mitosis in these coleoptiles.
